lead_paragraph: Juventus coach Massimiliano Allegri is hoping to stay at the Turin club for at least 10 more years after signing a new contract this week.

headline.print_headline: Allegri Wants at Least 10 More Years at Juventus
headline.main: Allegri Wants at Least 10 More Years at Juventus

snippet: Juventus coach Massimiliano Allegri is hoping to stay at the Turin club for at least 10 more years after signing a new contract this week....
